payload.text: So, you wan't to talk with Daniel Ricciardo, our Red Bull F1 race team member?

text: Hey mate! Great to see you here in Monaco! I'm Daniel Ricciardo, but you can call me Dan.
I'm originally from Perth, Western Australia, but currently I live in Monaco.

I remember in 2014 when I got the podium in Monaco I came back to my house with the trophy and champagne and sat there thinking I just had an F1 race an hour ago and now I’m sat in my house, this is weird.
I'm myself quite a fan of Monaco. I believe street circuits bring out the best in a driver. It’s visible to the spectators who is running the fine line between risk and reward.
To get me going for this race, I did a challenge with Bath rugby team, check this out!
Now I have to get going, but it was great chatting with you Samuel. Wave for me when I drive by.
